verbose_text: AMPK is activated through phosphorylation of the Thr 172 residue of the AMPK alpha catalytic subunit [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR], and this phosphorylation is largely regulated by molecules related to bioenergetic homeostasis including AMP, ADP, catecholamines, adiponectin, glycogen, and insulin.
evidence: phosphorylation of the Thr 172  residue of the AMPK alpha
